void wxIFMTabConfig::set_font (  const wxFont &  font  ) 
 

Sets the font used for rendering tab names. Modifying the font will also modify the padding used for tabs, which is based on the size of the font used. This is so that the interface will scale properly on machines running larger than normal DPI settings (120 vs 96). The padding value used is defined to be get_font_height() / 4.
